mapper.sql: id, field_name, field_zh_ch_name, jdbc_type, java_type, length, primary_key, foreign_key, comment, add_time, tb_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from table_field_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into table_field_info (id, field_name, field_zh_ch_name, jdbc_type, java_type, length, primary_key, foreign_key, comment, add_time, tb_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldZhChName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdbcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{javaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{primaryKey,jdbcType=BIT}, #{foreignKey,jdbcType=BIT}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into table_field_info (id, field_name, field_zh_ch_name, jdbc_type, java_type, length, primary_key, foreign_key, comment, add_time, tb_id) values
(#{tab.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tab.fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tab.fieldZhChName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tab.jdbcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tab.javaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tab.length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tab.primaryKey,jdbcType=BIT}, #{tab.foreignKey,jdbcType=BIT}, #{tab.comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tab.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tab.tbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update table_field_info
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field_name = #{record.fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field_zh_ch_name = #{record.fieldZhChName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jdbc_type = #{record.jdbcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
java_type = #{record.javaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
length = #{record.length,jdbcType=INTEGER},
primary_key = #{record.primaryKey,jdbcType=BIT},
foreign_key = #{record.foreignKey,jdbcType=BIT},
comment = #{record.comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tb_id = #{record.tbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update table_field_info set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_name = #{record.fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_zh_ch_name = #{record.fieldZhChName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jdbc_type = #{record.jdbcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, java_type = #{record.javaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length = #{record.length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, primary_key = #{record.primaryKey,jdbcType=BIT}, foreign_key = #{record.foreignKey,jdbcType=BIT}, comment = #{record.comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tb_id = #{record.tbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update table_field_info
field_name = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field_zh_ch_name = #{fieldZhChName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jdbc_type = #{jdbcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
java_type = #{javaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
length = #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER},
primary_key = #{primaryKey,jdbcType=BIT},
foreign_key = #{foreignKey,jdbcType=BIT},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tb_id = #{tbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update table_field_info set field_name = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_zh_ch_name = #{fieldZhChName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jdbc_type = #{jdbcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, java_type = #{javaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length = #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, primary_key = #{primaryKey,jdbcType=BIT}, foreign_key = #{foreignKey,jdbcType=BIT}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tb_id = #{tbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT tf.* FROM table_view tv JOIN view_field vf ON tv.id = vf.view_id JOIN view_field_item vfi ON vf.id = vfi.view_field_id JOIN table_field_info tf ON vfi.table_field_id = tf.id WHERE vt.id = #{id}
